description: Great for both a high-intensity workout and an afternoon of binge-watching, Smartwool's Womens Active Printed 7/8 Legging is made to fit you to a T. Its curve-hugging design is complemented by a high-rise waist that sits above the belly button. Plus, its four-way stretch fabric is breathable and combines with responsibly sourced Merino wool to provide moisture management and thermoregulation. With two pockets and a whole lot of comfort, this legging will give you effortless practicality from the minute you pull it on.
name: Active Printed 7/8 Leggings - Womens

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool, 47% Tencel™ Lyocell - Exclusive of Decoration
